rows.label: bf11550130_0003
rows.name: Metsu is after the seal...?

rows.label: bf11550130_0004
rows.name: Yes. Metsu is drawing closer to the capital.

rows.label: bf11550130_0005
rows.name: Even on the way here,

rows.label: bf11550130_0007
rows.name:
we saw several signs of destruction
that must have been Metsu's work.

rows.label: bf11550130_0009
rows.name: So what Deacon Marveni said was true...

rows.label: bf11550130_0010
rows.name: Your Majesty, Emperor Hugo.

rows.label: bf11550130_0020
rows.name:
I cannot thank you enough for your help
in our country's time of need.

rows.label: bf11550130_0030
rows.name: I thank you from the bottom of my heart.

rows.label: bf11550130_0040
rows.name: Please raise your head, Your Majesty.

rows.label: bf11550130_0050
rows.name:
I was only accompanying Prince Adel
and joining my friend's fight.

rows.label: bf11550130_0060
rows.name: If anyone deserves praise, it is the Prince.

rows.label: bf11550130_0070
rows.name: Oh, so my young Duke of Aletta...

rows.label: bf11550130_0072
rows.name:
...returns from his travels with the trust
of the Superbian Emperor himself.

rows.label: bf11550130_0080
rows.name: How splendid.

rows.label: bf11550130_0090
rows.name:
I am overjoyed to receive such undeserved
praise from both Your Majesties.

rows.label: bf11550130_0100
rows.name:
However, Your Majesty...
he cannot be met with only praise.

rows.label: bf11550130_0110
rows.name:
To bring an armed group of soldiers into the capital
without seeking Your Majesty's judgment...

rows.label: bf11550130_0120
rows.name: This requires a severe punishment.

rows.label: bf11550130_0130
rows.name: an our soldiers defeat Metsu alone?

rows.label: bf11550130_0132
rows.name: W-well...

rows.label: bf11550130_0134
rows.name: That's what I thought.

rows.label: bf11550130_0136
rows.name: Without flinching before such a powerful enemy,

rows.label: bf11550130_0138
rows.name:
it would be unthinkable to punish
the resistance army that came to our aid.

rows.label: bf11550130_0140
rows.name: B-but...

rows.label: bf11550130_0150
rows.name: Zettar, you are too obstinate.

rows.label: bf11550130_0160
rows.name: If anything, we should be rewarding Adel.

rows.label: bf11550130_0162
rows.name: How about we make him the Duke of Heblin?

rows.label: bf11550130_0170
rows.name: I am honored beyond words, but...

rows.label: bf11550130_0180
rows.name:
for now, could you let me focus
on commanding the resistance?

rows.label: bf11550130_0190
rows.name: We can't let Metsu get the seal.

rows.label: bf11550130_0200
rows.name:
I would be grateful if you would permit
the resistance to operate within Iiran territory.

rows.label: bf11550130_0210
rows.name: Well said. That's the spirit of a brave Iiran warrior.

rows.label: bf11550130_0220
rows.name:
Our nation must also cooperate
to destroy the Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf11550130_0230
rows.name: Acedia will also offer its full support.

rows.label: bf11550130_0240
rows.name:
Originally, this was my own lack of virtue.
I must bear the responsibility.

rows.label: bf11550130_0250
rows.name: Brother.

rows.label: bf11550130_0260
rows.name:
No, Your Majesty...
what do you mean by giving Heblin to Adel?

rows.label: bf11550130_0270
rows.name: He declined it himself. Let it go.

rows.label: bf11550130_0280
rows.name: Even so, he's taking too much power for himself.

rows.label: bf11550130_0290
rows.name:
Making an alliance with a foreign ruler,
forming a resistance army... all on his own!

rows.label: bf11550130_0300
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf11550130_0310
rows.name: Zettar, my brother. I believe...

rows.label: bf11550130_0320
rows.name:
In a world of such chaos, the crown is too heavy
for an ordinary man like myself...

rows.label: bf11550130_0330
rows.name: Y-Your Majesty...

rows.label: bf11550130_0340
rows.name: A throne in a time of chaos...

rows.label: bf11550130_0350
rows.name: is better suited for someone like Adel...

rows.label: bf11550130_0360
rows.name:
Brother... you can't mean to disinherit me
and make him the crown prince...
